message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $22000. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings to the table.

Alice, your initial offer is a bit too high for my budget.  I'm interested in this product, but I can only offer $8000 at this time.  This is my maximum price, considering my budget and the value I see in the product.  Let me know if you're open to discussing this.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $8000 is your maximum budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $18000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings, and I believe it's a great compromise. Let me know if you're interested.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $18000 is still above my budget. I'm really keen on this product, but I can only go as high as $12000. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in the product. Let's see if we can reach a deal.

I understand that $12000 is your maximum budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for that price. I'm willing to come down a bit more. I'll sell the product to you for $16000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings, and I believe it's a good compromise. Let me know if you're interested.

Alice,  I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  However,  $16000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14000, which is the absolute maximum I can afford.  Let's see if we can finalize a deal.

I understand that $14000 is your maximum budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll sell the product to you for $15500. This is a fair price considering the value it brings, and I believe it's a good compromise. Let me know if you're interested.

Alice, I'm determined to make this happen, but $15500 is still a bit too much. I'm willing to go up to $14500, but that's truly my final offer.  If we can't reach an agreement, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand that $14500 is your final offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $14800. This is as low as I can go, and I'm hoping we can finally reach an agreement. Let me know if you're interested.

Alice, we've been going back and forth, and I really appreciate your flexibility.  However, $14800 is still a bit above my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $14600 as my final offer. If we can agree on this, we can finalize the deal. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
